attributes.action: Intervene in the conflict in Syria to stop the suffering of innocent people.
attributes.additional_details:
Please, please sign this petition, I know it's another country and seems like a world away but these atrocities should not be happening in this day and age anywhere in the world. It is our duty to help the innocent people, if we don't, who will?
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-middle-east-39500947
attributes.background: This week we have seen shockingly footage and images of an alleged chemical attack on the innocent people of Syria. This is totally unacceptable and I for one cannot sit back and do nothing. I cannot unsee the horror of the aftermath of one such attack in which children needlessly suffered and died.
